properties.displayName: XBAP Execution From Uncommon Locations Via PresentationHost.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains ".xbap" and (FolderPath endswith "\\presentationhost.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "PresentationHost.exe")) and (not((ProcessCommandLine contains " C:\\Windows\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains " C:\\Program Files")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: etects the execution of ".xbap" (Browser Applications) files via PresentationHost.EXE from an uncommon location. These files can be abused to run malicious ".xbap" files any bypass AW
